title: WTT/WTS : T206 Sov 460 near complete sub set

posts.post_title: WTT/WTS : T206 Sov 460 near complete sub set
posts.post_content:
Hello All

Considering selling or trading my sov 460 near complete subset (38 of 52)...

only 14 more to go.......I lost interest when I traded away my cobby to a good friend:)
This is your chance to complete a very difficult sub set....tempt me with a big card:D
set is poor to vg cards ....a mix of raw and un graded.....some super prints also.....not looking to sell ANY individually....must go complete...

email me and I we can chat;)


INTEREST:

T206 Printers scraps.....rare back T206.....moola to get these:D


[url]jvanderbeck@verizon.net[/url]


Peace

Johnny

the last few cards I can locate most:)

no bites yet??:confused:
Surprised to see you trying to move this Johnny, I know how hard you've worked on it. Good luck!

Thanks my friend! I am a working class slob who needs to hit the lottery:) then lookout~!:D

that BEAUTY of a Chase you have listed is needed in the subset:)


buyer could get that while he/she is at it:)
